eeta sakriya dayakathwaya sapayamin ethumiya gath kriyamarga nisa ek awasthawaka indiyawa ha chinaya athara athi wu deshasima aragalayanda samathayata path kirimata ethumiyata haki wiya.rata thula thel janasathuwa, banku jana sathuwa samanga 1962 hamuda kumanthranayata da muhuna dun sirimawo bandaranayaka mathiniya oruwala wane, piliyandala pingan, modara piti, kalaniya tayar, galla simenthi wani rajya aayathana gananawakda aarambha kalaya.pasukalayaka idam sima panatha, niwasa sima panatha wani pragathishili panath gananawak mangin rate aadayam wishamathawa thuni karannata kriyamarga ganu labuwe shrilanipaye darshanayata anuwa bandaranayaka mahathata awasan kirimata nohaki wu katayuthu awasan kirima sandahaya.me athara belgred nobandi samuluwe sita 1964 kayiro samuluwa, 1970 lusaka samuluwa, 1973 alpiyurs samuluwa yana siyallanta sahabhagi wu mathiniya ee atharin 1976 5 wani nobandi samuluwa kolambaa pawathwimata da piyawara gaththaya.nobandi rajya sankhyawa wegayen wardhanaya weddi eeta shakriya dayakathwayak labadimata ethumiyata haki wiya.
